name: telegram-reminder-bot
description: Telegram bot สำหรับส่งข้อความแจ้งเตือนตามเวลาที่กำหนด

scripts.check-env: node -e "require('dotenv-flow').config(); console.log('Current Environment:', process.env.NODE_ENV); console.log('Database:', process.env.TIDB_DATABASE); console.log('Log Level:', process.env.LOG_LEVEL);"
scripts.verify-env: node -e "const config = require('./config'); console.log('✅ Environment:', config.env); console.log('✅ Port:', config.port); console.log('✅ Database:', config.database.host); console.log('✅ Timezone:', config.timezone); console.log('✅ Config loaded successfully!');"
